```json
  "Security Protocols": "To ensure the security of the system:
  - Data at rest will be encrypted using AES-256
  - Data in transit will be encrypted using TLS (Transport Layer Security)
  - Access will be limited based on user authentication and role-based access control",
  
  "Accessibility Features": "To ensure the system is user-friendly and accessible:
  - Standard UI/UX methods will be used to navigate the system
  - Accessibility features such as a colorblind mode will be implemented
  - System notifications will be based on clear and specific messages",
  
  "Platform Compatibility": "To support multiple platforms, compatibility with the following browsers and devices will be ensured:

  - Mobile OS versions: iOS 15+, Android 11+
  - Latest supported mobile devices",
  
  "Data Storage Solution": "The distributed NoSQL database will handle the large datasets efficiently by:
  - Distributing data across nodes
  - Optimizing query execution with an asynchronous approach
  - Centralizing indexes to provide minute webpage load times",
  
  "Development Timeline": "The estimated development timeline is:
  - Requirements gathering and analysis: 2 weeks
  - System design and roadmap: 2 weeks
  - Development phase ( estimated 24 weeks)
  - Testing and quality assurance (4 weeks)
  - Deployment and roll-out: 2 weeks
  Total time estimated: 34 weeks"
}
```
